alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 3:28PM EDT until June 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallahassee Community College, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Springsax Park, Apalachee Ridge Estates and Arran. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
